isAttached.description:
If true, the borderRadius of button that are direct children will be altered
to look flushed together
isAttached.description_zh:
如果为 true，则作为直接子项的按钮的 borderRadius 将被更改
一起看起来潮红

isDisabled.description: If true, all wrapped button will be disabled
isDisabled.description_zh: 如果为 true，则将禁用所有包装按钮
